title: Don’t Publish Yet! Watch Me Research Amazon KDP Niches First
description:
Do you want to self-publish a book on Amazon KDP, but you don't know where to start?
When it comes to niche research on Amazon for Self-Publishing, it's always best to take your time. You can use a free tool like the AMZ Expander or a tool like the one you see in this video called...

KDSPY 👉 https://bit.ly/3J6NM4x (Highly recommend if you're serious about publishing books long-term)

Are you interested in self-publishing a poetry book? 
3:09 - Enroll Today 👉 https://bit.ly/49bPmge
